text: Motion
Motion
Motion
I'm sorry for being selfish and dragging you along...

No, no, I wanted to take a walk too.
But... why all the way up to the hill?

Well...
there's no real reason...
It's like I wanted to do something without a reason...

Even though I'm looking at so many things,
it feels like I'm not seeing anything at all...
...Yeah.

A big comet hasn't come yet,
so maybe it's nice to leisurely search for stars.

But... you can't see as many stars as back home here.
The city lights are prettier than that...

...Underneath those lights, there are so many people
who still don't know about me...

Someday, someone among them...
Will become my fan and support me, won't they?

Ah... I'm sure they will.
To the point where these lights won't be enough.

Eh...?!
That much...?!

Haha...
But I hope so...
...I want to remember this moment.

Even though I don't know what will happen next
or what the future holds...

Right now, standing here with you, Producer-san,
feeling like this...
Yeah... I won't forget either.

So...
how do you feel right now, Haruki?

Um...
it's difficult to put into words...

I'm feeling something very special, though,
that's for sure.
